method gives significant improvement in success rate in comparison with random baseline across all the NMT models. The number of replacement for Min-Grad is comparable with random.  Table IV shows that

success rate and similar number of replacement in case for Transformer than BLSTM. Overall, as is evident from Table IV, our proposed method (Min-Grad + Soft-Att) achieves the
